title: Password Management & Digital Safety in The Villages, FL
headline: Stop writing passwords on paper. Let's secure them properly.
description: We help The Villages residents set up secure password managers, create strong passphrases, and protect online accounts from hacks, breaches, and scams. Digital safety begins with good credentials.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
sections.paragraph: Over 80% of data breaches start with weak or reused passwords. Worse, many people store them in browsers where malware and phishing attacks can easily access them.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Set up a secure, encrypted password manager
Import, audit, and clean up your existing passwords
Create strong passphrases using trusted methods
Review your accounts for breach exposure

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We walk you through best practices for modern password hygiene. Whether you're managing dozens of logins or helping family members stay safe, our setup makes it painless, secure, and user-friendly.
